channel.title: How can I make a moving ball?
channel.description: I want to make a sphere, orb, ball, whatever ingame that moves when I shoot it or hit it. I made a ball, but how do I get it to not float in the air and move when i shoot it, like a soccer ball?

item.title: How can I make a moving ball?
item.dc:creator: Spycrabz
item.description:
Stop putting your nutsack in deep freeze.

Alternatively, https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Func_physbox

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make a moving ball?

item.title: How can I make a moving ball?
item.dc:creator: baconeggs
item.description:
Kisuke Moto:

What the hell does that mean?

??? is the magical process whereby any arbitrary action becomes profitable to the one performing it.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make a moving ball?

item.title: How can I make a moving ball?
item.dc:creator: p0rt1r
item.description:
did you script the model properly?
whats the collision box for the model like? should be pretty much a replica of the ball except a tiny bit bigger.
Im abit of a noob when it comes to this but i still managed to get a head to roll across teh room.
Just follow the tutorials

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make a moving ball?

item.title: How can I make a moving ball?
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
Snowbound:

It’s not working.
The ball is there, but when I hit it, it moves a tiny bit, but returns to its original position when I stop hitting it.
This in hammer, by the way.

meh just steal the bouncy ball from garrys mod and re-colour it.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I make a moving ball?
item.dc:creator: Flash-Killer
item.description:
Step 1: Select the ball.
Step 2: Click CTRL-T.
Step 3: Choose func_physbox on the dropdown list.
Step 4: ???
Step 5: Profit.

You can play around with the settings.

Read full topic
